price: 8 Voilà assurément un signe, mais la plupart d’entre eux ne sont pas croyants.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
